POSIX Utilities Package 2.2 Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
ErrnoExceptionA mechanism for basic run-time exception handling
MessageQueueInter-process messaging mechanism
PtBarrierThe pthread barrier synchronization object
RecursiveMutexA wrapper for pthread mutex, with the added functionality that it is recursive
RWLockThe pthread reader-writer lock
ShMemShared memory objects
StatusReportAn object for storing status messages containing a integer code, a message and a timestamp
TCPClientThis is the client part of the TCPServer/TCPClient pair
TCPServerThis is the server part of the TCPServer/TCPClient pair
ThreadA mechanism to execute code in a separate thread
UDPClientThis is the client part of the UDPServer/UDPClient pair
UDPServerThis is the server part of the UDPServer/UDPClient pair
